feat.value: You have given glory to God indeed.
It’s to you that I speak, you Aphthonia, daughter of the Comes Alexander.
Have you not honoured the place you were nourished in according to God and according to the world , in your words and your deeds?
If your heart hadn’t corrupted, you would not despise the place you are in, or shame the sisters who are in the place with you.
They call you by your name “Aphthonia”, but you revile yourself alone.
And you are a slanderer to you yourself, what you wish is to destroy your soul, which the whole world isn’t worthy of.
and to lead astray in your sufferings for no reason.
For you have left room for Satan inside you to transform your heart, and daze you like those sheep that become (spoiled) by moths.
You stupid and foolish one in which there isn’t wisdom.
For if there had been knowledge in you, even if they truly fought with you, then you ought to let a man know how they are inside your place.
Most of all when you sent to your father and your mother: “they fought with me,” or “they abused me”.
It’s you lying, as they didn’t fight with you nor did they abuse you.
That they “fought with you” was that you were given knowledge in your transgressing the law by your receiving something from your parents without asking.
What is it that you asked for or needed and were rejected, or you weren’t given it?
If you told your father and your mother, are we to be afraid?
All the more so as you lie.
So you don’t want us to tell them about your foolish actions which you do and your stealing and your quarrels.
Oh you truly blind one who gropes in daylight like those who are in midnight and like those blind ones, who have no eyes.
Where is it that your parents from the world will hear of your action inside this place, without us knowing in the monastery?
So if they truly did violence to you or grieved or pained you, you should have told us of your pain.
I tell you we’ll know if it’s the truth you’re telling or not.
Or you should have told your mother in this place with you.
If you don’t call her only with your mouth “mother”.
But it’s that your heart is distant far away from her.
As it is written:
“this people honours me with their lips, but their heart is distant far away from me.”
For if your stupid heart hadn’t darkened on you, would you have scorned your parents who are in the community with you,
or despised the sisters that you dwell with in your pride and your boastfulness?
Or if you hadn’t left behind you the teaching and the wisdom.
And as you loved what is evil, instead of what is good.
Would you have practiced things which are evil, and said with your mouth that is full of curses upon bitterness:
“I’ll go to another monastery”.
In what was it that this place did you violence?
Or what is the weight that they put on you,
except that they told you “don’t violate the command of God,”
because you gave perfume and mesouaphi to a maiden while she was in the house with you
so that you’ll become an obstacle and a scandal to each other.
For this thing, I promise you that if you don’t give your admission and take away this disobedience of yours and those quarrels in vain,
I will make your heart suffer.
And I will make them treat you like what came out of you mouth.
Indeed I am concerned, for you (Aphthonia) and for you (the congregation).
What I'm afraid of is that, in the way that the serpent deceived Eve in his treachery, your hearts waste away from the simplicity and the purity which bring to Christ.
If he didn't leave the one who is there in paradise, is it you (Aphthonia) that he will spare?
Or you (the congregation), in your leaving room for him inside yourselves.
As you also indulge in his plans of guile and his wicked deeds.
For he will not have power over those who fear God inside. Those for whom Christ is an aid and a protector.
As it is written: 'the one who fights on your behalf is your aid, and the sword of your pride and the glory of your foundation'
Whoever will love that which is evil, he is the one who will perish.
And he is the one that the devil will have power over in his deeds of soul killing.
But the wise one who loves the teaching, he will receive the commandment.
And the intelligent one who fears God inside will acquire guidance for himself.
But let me hear that you have pleased your parents who are in the place with you.
And that you obey them in every action.
And our heart shall be at ease.
And as for you, you will be filled with satisfaction.
But if you still have something to say, here are the elders, our parents and our brothers, they have come to you.
Proclaim it to them, and all of you.
So you have words there, or any deed in your place.
Don't continue to want to tell them
As you do not hide anything from them
So that all our hearts may be at ease together, we and you.
And God will be pleased with us too.
